---
name: Question template
about: Template for asking questions or requesting clarification
title: ''
labels: 'question'
assignees: ''

---

## Question

_What would you like to know or clarify?_

## Context

_Provide background or details that help others understand your question (e.g., what you’ve tried, where you’re stuck, or why you’re asking)._

## Expected answer or goal

_What kind of answer or outcome are you hoping for? (e.g., explanation, code example, guidance, etc.)_

## Additional notes

_Any screenshots, logs, links, or extra details that might help others answer your question._
